pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, August 31, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, August 31, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the United Food and Commercial Workers Canada National Council Convention.

Main ballroom – 4th floor
Centre Sheraton Hotel
1201 Rene-Levesque Boulevard West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m. and should present themselves to Level A, Salon Nelligan

Media Appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister with theSkimm will air on their social channels at 6:00 a.m.
